definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Hold up with the bamboo skewers.
Put the small balls into the boiling water until they become flowing.
sentences.chinese: 把搓好的小丸子放入滚水中煮滚及浮起。

sentences.english: Blood brean curd ball is a feature food in shaoyang.
sentences.chinese: 猪血丸子是邵阳的一种特色食品。

sentences.english: I like sausages, meatballs and beef.
sentences.chinese: 我想吃香肠，肉丸子和牛肉。

sentences.english: Would you finish off the last meat ball?
sentences.chinese: 剩一个肉丸子你就吃了吧。

sentences.english: It cited the so-called "four-joy meatballs" as an example.
sentences.chinese: 文章以所谓的“四喜丸子”为例。

sentences.english: We have pretty good Spaghetti with meat balls.
sentences.chinese: 我们有很好吃的义大利面加肉丸子。

sentences.english: I want some meatballs, beef, a potato and rice for.
sentences.chinese: 我午饭想吃肉丸子，牛肉，一个土豆和米饭。

sentences.english: When you make meatball you must hash up meat.
sentences.chinese: 做肉丸子时，你一定要把肉切碎。

sentences.english: These croquettes are too hot to eat.
sentences.chinese: 这些炸丸子太热而无法吃。

sentences.english: The broiled beef patty can instead be rolled into little kid-size meatballs .
sentences.chinese: 与其烤牛肉饼，不如把肉做成小小的肉丸子。

sentences.english: He loves listening to traditional opera and his favorite foods are eggs and meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢听古早戏曲，最喜欢的食物是鸡蛋和肉丸子。

sentences.english: Four meat balls, standing for the festivity and family union.
sentences.chinese: 四喜丸子，代表团圆和喜庆。

sentences.english: Using a slotted spoon ease dumplings into the boiling salted water and let boil.
sentences.chinese: 用漏勺将丸子慢慢放入滚水锅里煮沸。

definition: nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
poached egg/egg fried on both sides
